data.text:
@PoliDigitalUK Lol. Lucky him, many people weren’t able to see, mothers, fathers, sisters, brothers etc before they passed away in hospitals or care homes. 

But as long as he only broke the rules cause he “loves” some bird he just met, all is forgiven.
@PoliDigitalUK The defence of an emotional retard.
@PoliDigitalUK I bet his wife was pleased about that  Abhorrent vile man he is.
